titles.title: To amend the White House Conference on the Small Business Authorization Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Lafalce moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 8/2/1993--Passed House amended. Amends the White House Conference on Small Business Authorization Act to: (1) extend to between May 1 and September 30, 1995, the authorized period for conducting a National Conference on Small Business; (2) extend through March 1, 1994, the authorized period for conducting State conferences on such subject; (3) direct the President to select and appoint the 11 individuals to the White House Conference on Small Business Commission within 30 days after enactment of this Act; and (4) increase the authorization of appropriations to carry out the purposes of such Act.
